Activate desktop notifications: Activer les notifications sur l'espace de travail
Handle users watches and notifications: Gestion des notifications et des alertes.
Display a new entry with all events happ: Display a new entry with all events happening on a user workspaces, and alerts. An SQL database must be setup for the FEED_DRIVER configuration.
Display workspaces activity to the users: Affiche un widget avec un flux d'activité dans le panneau d'information.
